archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Close Service Performance Degradation Report
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Close a service performance degradation report when the service performance has been resolved

properties.value: The objective of the Close Service Performance Degradation Report processes is to close a service performance degradation report when the service performance has been resolved. These processes monitor the status of all open service performance degradation reports, and recognize that a service performance degradation report is ready to be closed when the status is changed to cleared.
